notificationLevelSetTo: Notification level set to: {notificationLevel} (Value will be reset to default if the bot is rebooted or stopped)
ttsEnabled: tts enabled (Value will be reset to default if the bot is rebooted or stopped)
ttsDisabled: tts disabled (Value will be reset to default if the bot is rebooted or stopped)
helpMessage:
Help:
%start - Starts the bot in the text channel
%stop - Stops the bot
%level {0} - Notification level
	0 - Only notifies when the first user joins a voice channel or moves to an empty voice channel (Default)
	1 - Notifies when a user joins a channel
	2 - Notifies when a user joins or disconnects from a channel
%tts {0} - Enable tts: false or true
